name: RGB: Raging Globs & Blobs
description:
Help the noble samurai defend himself from the globs and blobs! The samurai can only attack in one color-dimension at a time, but the same doesn't go for his slimey foes

Controls

Space + WASD or Arrow keys for movement

Scroll wheel to change color-dimension

Click to attack

The Team

  • Sound, Coffee, fries and accomodations - Jelle Denis
  • Programmer - Koen Cardoen
  • Programmer - Arne van der Lei
  • Artist - Pieter Pauwels
  • Artist- Sara Obert
  • Artist - Hanne van de Vijver
  • sounds - zapsplat.com
